name: BusinessMan: The Corporate Adventure
description:
BusinessMan: The Corporate Adventure is a 3D simulation, roleplaying game set in a crazy cartoon world combining real time with turn based elements, where the player has to choose which path to take on a day to day basis.

  • Build your character as you see fit.
  • Decide your daily task and make sure to complete it.
  • Choose wisely when opportunities arrive. Take on too many and you risk not completing your daily task.
  • Spend your hard earned money on seminar that will help you, or to live the sweet life at home.

I need help testing this game, so if you have tried it and want to help me out please go and fill out this questionnaire: https://goo.gl/forms/tQZ1DlYXJAvCppD33
